channel.title: Control Panel
channel.description: I don't know if this is possible, but is there a way to add a image on a control panel for a 718 source? I'm trying to add a small, simple donator icon image.

item.title: Control Panel
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Assuming your using a swing panel.

[code]
import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JPanel;

public class Example {
public static void main(String args[]) {
JFrame jf = new JFrame(“Example”);
JPanel pan = new JPanel();
jf.setContentPane(pan);

    //*********
    ImageIcon icon = new ImageIcon("Example.png");
    JLabel label = new JLabel("Donator");
    label.setIcon(icon);
    //************
    
    pan.add(label);
    jf.setVisible(true);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
